alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 25 at 12:10PM EST until December 27 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, with localized higher amounts likely. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult, with areas of snow, blowing snow and visibility below one half of a mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
